languages.text: "Меня было за что убить. Я сеял смерть. Даровал Ему души самых красивых дев и юношей, что мог отыскать — это распаляло мое сердце. Я убивал богатых, что были недостойны нести бремя изобилия, и забирал их троны. И блюстителей, что не боялись смотреть мне в глаза — я хотел, чтобы меня боялись! Я упивался кровью и умывался ею. Сошел со стези. Я знал об этом, но ничего не мог поделать. Ибо мне... это нравилось".

"There were plenty of reasons. I sowed death. I offered Him the souls of the most pleasing men and women I could find because it kindled my passions. I killed well-off crewmen who didn't deserve their wealth, and I took their thrones. I killed enforcers who looked into my eyes without fear — because I wanted to be feared! I revelled in bloodshed. I betrayed the Tenets. I realised it, but I couldn't help it... because I enjoyed it."
languages.original_text: "Меня было за что убить. Я сеял смерть. Даровал Ему души самых красивых дев и юношей, что мог отыскать — это распаляло мое сердце. Я убивал богатых, что были недостойны нести бремя изобилия, и забирал их троны. И блюстителей, что не боялись смотреть мне в глаза — я хотел, чтобы меня боялись! Я упивался кровью и умывался ею. Сошел со стези. Я знал об этом, но ничего не мог поделать. Ибо мне... это нравилось".

traits.locale_text: "There were plenty of reasons. I sowed death. I offered Him the souls of the most pleasing men and women I could find because it stoked my heart. I killed well-off crewmen who didn't deserve their wealth, and I took their thrones. I killed enforcers who looked into my eyes without fear — because I wanted to be feared! I revelled in bloodshed. I betrayed the Way. I realised it, but I couldn't help it... because I enjoyed it."

"There were plenty of reasons. I sowed death. I offered Him the souls of the most pleasing men and women I could find because it stoked my heart. I killed well-off crewmen who didn't deserve their wealth, and I took their thrones. I killed enforcers who looked into my eyes without fear — because I wanted to be feared! I revelled in bloodshed. I betrayed the Way. I realised it, but I couldn't help it... because I enjoyed it."

I killed well-off crewmen who didn't deserve their wealth, and I took their thrones. I killed enforcers who looked into my eyes without fear — because I wanted to be feared! I revelled in bloodshed. I betrayed the Tenets. I realised it, but I couldn't help it... because I enjoyed it."

I betrayed the Tenets. I realised it, but I couldn't help it... because I enjoyed it."

I killed well-off crewmen who didn't deserve their wealth, and I took their thrones. I killed enforcers who looked into my eyes without fear — because I wanted to be feared! I revelled in bloodshed. I betrayed the Tenets. I realised it, but I couldn't help it... because I enjoyed it."

languages.text: « Ce ne sont pas les raisons qui manquaient. J'ai semé la mort. Je Lui ai offert les âmes des gens les plus séduisants que j'ai pu trouver simplement pour assouvir mes désirs. J'ai tué des membres d'équipage qui ne méritaient pas les richesses qu'ils avaient amassées et je les ai dépouillés de leurs trônes. J'ai massacré des prévôts qui me regardaient sans crainte... uniquement parce que je voulais qu'on me craigne ! Je me délectais de ces bains de sang. J'ai trahi les Préceptes. Je m'en rendais compte, mais je ne pouvais pas m'en empêcher... parce que ça me procurait bien trop de plaisir. »
languages.original_text: "There were plenty of reasons. I sowed death. I offered Him the souls of the most pleasing men and women I could find because it kindled my passions. I killed well-off crewmen who didn't deserve their wealth, and I took their thrones. I killed enforcers who looked into my eyes without fear — because I wanted to be feared! I revelled in bloodshed. I betrayed the Tenets. I realised it, but I couldn't help it... because I enjoyed it."

traits.locale_text: « Ce ne sont pas les raisons qui manquaient. J'ai semé la mort. Je Lui ai offert les âmes des gens les plus séduisants que j'ai pu trouver simplement pour assouvir mes désirs. J'ai tué des membres d'équipage qui ne méritaient pas les richesses qu'ils avaient amassées et je les ai dépouillés de leurs trônes. J'ai massacré des prévôts qui me regardaient sans crainte... uniquement parce que je voulais qu'on me craigne ! Je me délectais de ces bains de sang. J'ai trahi les Préceptes. Je m'en rendais compte, mais je ne pouvais pas m'en empêcher... parce que ça me procurait bien trop de plaisir. »

languages.text: «Hubo motivos de sobra. Sembré muerte. Ofrecí al Inmortal las almas de los hombres y mujeres más atractivos que pude encontrar porque hacerlo encendía mis pasiones. Maté a miembros opulentos de la tripulación que no merecían sus riquezas y me quedé con sus tronos. ¡Maté a guardias que me miraron a los ojos sin temor alguno porque quería que me tuvieran miedo! Me deleitaba con el derramamiento de sangre. Traicioné la Doctrina. Y era consciente, pero no podía evitarlo... porque lo disfrutaba».
languages.original_text: "There were plenty of reasons. I sowed death. I offered Him the souls of the most pleasing men and women I could find because it kindled my passions. I killed well-off crewmen who didn't deserve their wealth, and I took their thrones. I killed enforcers who looked into my eyes without fear — because I wanted to be feared! I revelled in bloodshed. I betrayed the Tenets. I realised it, but I couldn't help it... because I enjoyed it."

traits.locale_text: «Hubo motivos de sobra. Sembré muerte. Ofrecí al Inmortal las almas de los hombres y mujeres más atractivos que pude encontrar porque hacerlo encendía mis pasiones. Maté a miembros opulentos de la tripulación que no merecían sus riquezas y me quedé con sus tronos. ¡Maté a guardias que me miraron a los ojos sin temor alguno porque quería que me tuvieran miedo! Me deleitaba con el derramamiento de sangre. Traicioné la Doctrina. Y era consciente, pero no podía evitarlo... porque lo disfrutaba».

languages.text: 「理由はたくさんありました。私は死を蒔いた。自分の情熱に火をつけたいがために、とても魅力的な男女の魂をあのお方に捧げたのです。私はその富に相応しくない裕福なクルーを殺し、彼らの王座を奪いました。私の目を恐れることなく見つめるエンフォーサーたちを殺しました…恐怖を感じたかったから！血が流れるのを楽しみました。信条に背いたのです。それに気づいてはいましたが、どうすることもできなかった…喜びを感じていたからです」
languages.original_text: "There were plenty of reasons. I sowed death. I offered Him the souls of the most pleasing men and women I could find because it kindled my passions. I killed well-off crewmen who didn't deserve their wealth, and I took their thrones. I killed enforcers who looked into my eyes without fear — because I wanted to be feared! I revelled in bloodshed. I betrayed the Tenets. I realised it, but I couldn't help it... because I enjoyed it."

traits.locale_text: 「理由はたくさんありました。私は死を蒔いた。自分の情熱に火をつけたいがために、とても魅力的な男女の魂をあのお方に捧げたのです。私はその富に相応しくない裕福なクルーを殺し、彼らの王座を奪いました。私の目を恐れることなく見つめるエンフォーサーたちを殺しました…恐怖を感じたかったから！血が流れるのを楽しみました。信条に背いたのです。それに気づいてはいましたが、どうすることもできなかった…喜びを感じていたからです」

languages.text: “因为很多原因。我四处播撒死亡，我把我能找到的最可爱的男男女女的灵魂献给不死之神，因为这种行为点燃了我的激情。我杀害了那些不配得到财富的船员，夺走了他们的财产。我杀了那些对我毫无畏惧，敢于直视我的执法者，因为我想让别人惧怕我！我以流血为乐，我背叛了信条。我意识到了这一点，但我就是忍不住……因为我喜欢这么做。”
languages.original_text: "There were plenty of reasons. I sowed death. I offered Him the souls of the most pleasing men and women I could find because it kindled my passions. I killed well-off crewmen who didn't deserve their wealth, and I took their thrones. I killed enforcers who looked into my eyes without fear — because I wanted to be feared! I revelled in bloodshed. I betrayed the Tenets. I realised it, but I couldn't help it... because I enjoyed it."

traits.locale_text: “因为很多原因。我四处播撒死亡，我把我能找到的最可爱的男男女女的灵魂献给不死之神，因为这种行为点燃了我的激情。我杀害了那些不配得到财富的船员，夺走了他们的财产。我杀了那些对我毫无畏惧，敢于直视我的执法者，因为我想让别人惧怕我！我以流血为乐，我背叛了信条。我意识到了这一点，但我就是忍不住……因为我喜欢这么做。”

languages.text: "Es gab viele Gründe. Ich habe den Tod gesät. Ich habe Ihm die Seelen der angenehmsten Männer und Frauen angeboten, die ich finden konnte, weil es meine Leidenschaften entbrennen ließ. Ich habe wohlhabende Crewmitglieder getötet, die ihren Wohlstand nicht verdienten, und ihnen ihre Throne genommen. Ich habe Enforcers getötet, die mir ohne Angst in die Augen blickten – weil ich gefürchtet werden wollte! Ich habe das Blutvergießen genossen. Ich habe die Grundsätze verraten. Ich wusste es, aber ich konnte nichts dagegen tun ... weil es mir Freude bereitete."
languages.original_text: "There were plenty of reasons. I sowed death. I offered Him the souls of the most pleasing men and women I could find because it kindled my passions. I killed well-off crewmen who didn't deserve their wealth, and I took their thrones. I killed enforcers who looked into my eyes without fear — because I wanted to be feared! I revelled in bloodshed. I betrayed the Tenets. I realised it, but I couldn't help it... because I enjoyed it."

traits.locale_text: "Es gab viele Gründe. Ich habe den Tod gesät. Ich habe Ihm die Seelen der angenehmsten Männer und Frauen angeboten, die ich finden konnte, weil es meine Leidenschaften entbrennen ließ. Ich habe wohlhabende Crewmitglieder getötet, die ihren Wohlstand nicht verdienten, und ihnen ihre Throne genommen. Ich habe Enforcers getötet, die mir ohne Angst in die Augen blickten – weil ich gefürchtet werden wollte! Ich habe das Blutvergießen genossen. Ich habe die Grundsätze verraten. Ich wusste es, aber ich konnte nichts dagegen tun ... weil es mir Freude bereitete."

languages.text: "Sebep çoktu. Elim epey kanlıydı. O'na bulabildiğim en hoş kimselerin ruhlarını sundum. Böyle zevk alıyordum çünkü. Kazandıkları parayı hak etmeyen zengin tayfaları öldürdüm. Geltlerini de iç ettim. Korkusuzca gözümün içine bakan infazcıları öldürdüm... Benden korksunlar istedim! Keyfimce kan akıttım. İlkelere ihanet ettim. Bunları gördüm ama karşı koyamadım... Seviyordum çünkü."
languages.original_text: "There were plenty of reasons. I sowed death. I offered Him the souls of the most pleasing men and women I could find because it kindled my passions. I killed well-off crewmen who didn't deserve their wealth, and I took their thrones. I killed enforcers who looked into my eyes without fear — because I wanted to be feared! I revelled in bloodshed. I betrayed the Tenets. I realised it, but I couldn't help it... because I enjoyed it."
